column6: Ant-Man faces off against his deadliest arch-enemy -- the mercenary known as TASKMASTER! Can we really call him an "arch-enemy"? Well, they've actually fought a bunch of times (look it up). And they definitely don't like each other -- that's what "arch" means, right? There's a mystery villain pulling the strings! He's the one covered in heavy shadow. Mystery villains never have good lighting. Need to get to an Ikea or something.
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Brooks | artist:Ramon Rosanas | writer:Nick Spencer
